alert.note: Alert for Lapeer; Macomb; Oakland (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 13 at 4:52PM EDT by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...Clusters of strong thunderstorms in southern Lapeer, Oakland and Macomb Counties through 545 PM EDT... At 450 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line from near Lapeer to near Oxford to near Southfield and extending west through Oakland county. Movement was east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds near 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. The leading edge of thunderstorms will be near... Rochester around 500 PM EDT. Dryden and Lum around 505 PM EDT. Imlay City, Royal Oak and Detroit Zoo around 515 PM EDT. Romeo around 525 PM EDT. Warren around 530 PM EDT. St. Clair Shores, Richmond, Grosse Pointe and Armada around 545 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by these storms include Anchorville, Franklin, Keego Harbor, Waterford, Shelby Township, Holly State Recreation Area, Commerce, Ray Center, Utica and Auburn Hills. People attending Pine Knob Music Theatre should continue to seek safe shelter. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Heavy rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Use caution during the evening commute.
